publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4302 Richard Baker: North East Footballing Success—That the Parliament congratulates Deveronvale FC on winning the Highland League for the second time in four years; recognises the achievements of both Fraserburgh FC and Cove Rangers FC in reaching the final of the Highland League Cup; pays tribute to players and staff at all three clubs for their terrific achievements this season; believes that these achievements reflect the quality and strength of football in the north east, and wishes the teams well in the future.

S2M-4302 Richard Baker: North East Footballing Success—That the Parliament congratulates Deveronvale FC on winning the Highland League for the second time in four years; recognises the achievements of both Fraserburgh FC and Cove Rangers FC in reaching the final of the Highland League Cup; pays tribute to players and staff at all three clubs for their terrific achievements this season; believes that these achievements reflect the quality and strength of football in the north east, and wishes the teams well in the future.
S2M-4302 North East Footballing Success (lodged on 26 April 2006) Stewart Stevenson*
S2M-4302 North East Footballing Success (lodged on 26 April 2006) Mr David Davidson*
S2M-4302 North East Footballing Success (lodged on 26 April 2006) Nora Radcliffe*
